sentences.sContent: Good ability to solve problem; good attitude for work and good energy for solidify synergic , stronger responsibility for work.

sentences.sCn: 有处理解决较大工艺问题的能力，有良好的工作态度和团结协作的精神。工作责任心强。

sentences.sContent: His first office day after was in office on January 21 this year signs a memorandum, acceptance uses Internet to raise a government " diaphaneity, participate in gender and synergic sex " .

sentences.sCn: 他在今年1月21日执政后的首个办公日签署一份备忘录，承诺利用互联网来提高政府的“透明度、参与性和协作性”。
